definitions: Transferring software from one system or platform to another.
Carrying or moving an object, especially a firearm, in a specific manner.
Modifying an internal combustion engine's intake or exhaust ports to improve airflow.
Transferring a telecommunications number from one provider to another.
examples: They are porting the app to Android.
The soldier was porting his rifle.
He is porting the cylinder heads for more power.
I am porting my phone number to a new carrier.
